Reviews.Content: Lots of Litter... Where's the Wifi? Check-in was very prompt and effecient, and the room was functional (as you would expect from Motel 6). There were a couple of unexpected problems I encountered, however. This hotel advertises Wifi Internet Access, both on their web site and with a banner in front of the hotel, yet no hotspots were even visible from my room, let alone accessible. I was also surprised with the amount of litter around the property. The litter was scattered all over the place, with some even floating in the pool.Would I stay here again? Perhaps, but only if it were a bit less expensive, and I was only looking for a bed to sleep on and nothing else.
Reviews.Author: rickscholz
